name: Private Investigations
description:
// About the Game:

A Python murder mystery text adventure with a light-hearted spin. Set aboard a paranoid pleasure city, race against time as you uncover clues throughout a grand concert hall, and put an end to the schemes of a sinister vigilante.

Features:
  • Sneak, solve puzzles, and uncover clues.
  • Blow the lid on a sinister conspiracy plaguing a floating city before time runs out.
  • Point your finger at who you think is the murderer.
  • There are no wrong answers: not everyone is what they seem. 
  • Branching narratives and up to 6 different endings.
  • Non-linear game design: explore where, when and how you want to.
  • Immerse yourself in the game's intricately designed ambience and soundtrack:

  • Unlock up to 5 neat achievements. 
Requirements:
  • Pygame - To execute the game's sounds and music
  • IDLE or any other code interpreter of your choosing (e.g Vscode)

Please refer to Pygame's GettingStarted Wiki if you have not yet downloaded Pygame.
